MemberSignature.Value: public void GetClassID (out Guid pClassID);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void GetClassID([out] valuetype System.Guid& pClassID) cil managed
Public Sub GetClassID (ByRef pClassID As Guid)
public: void GetClassID([Runtime::InteropServices::Out] Guid % pClassID);

Docs.param: On successful return, a reference to the CLSID.
Docs.summary: Retrieves the class identifier (CLSID) of an object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks For more information, please see the existing documentation for `IPersist::GetClassID` in the MSDN library.

MemberSignature.Value: public void GetCurFile (out string ppszFileName);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void GetCurFile([out] string& ppszFileName) cil managed
Public Sub GetCurFile (ByRef ppszFileName As String)
public: void GetCurFile([Runtime::InteropServices::Out] System::String ^ % ppszFileName);

Docs.param: The address of a pointer to a zero-terminated string containing the path for the current file, or the default filename prompt (such as *.txt).
Docs.summary: Retrieves either the absolute path to current working file of the object, or if there is no current working file, the default filename prompt of the object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks For more information, please see the existing documentation for `IPersistFile::GetCurFile` in the MSDN library.

MemberSignature.Value: public int IsDirty ();
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance int32 IsDirty() cil managed
Public Function IsDirty () As Integer
public: int IsDirty();

Docs.summary: Checks an object for changes since it was last saved to its current file.
Docs.returns: if the file has changed since it was last saved; if the file has not changed since it was last saved.

remarks.format: ## Remarks For more information, please see the existing documentation for `IPersistFile::IsDirty` in the MSDN library.

MemberSignature.Value: public void Load (string pszFileName, int dwMode);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Load(string pszFileName, int32 dwMode) cil managed
Public Sub Load (pszFileName As String, dwMode As Integer)
public: void Load(System::String ^ pszFileName, int dwMode);

Docs.param: A zero-terminated string containing the absolute path of the file to open.
A combination of values from the enumeration to indicate the access mode in which to open pszFileName.
Docs.summary: Opens the specified file and initializes an object from the file contents.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The `STGM` enumeration is not part of the .NET Framework, but is documented in the MSDN library.
For more information, please see the existing documentation for `IPersistFile::Load` in the MSDN library.

MemberSignature.Value: public void Save (string pszFileName, bool fRemember);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Save(string pszFileName, bool fRemember) cil managed
Public Sub Save (pszFileName As String, fRemember As Boolean)
public: void Save(System::String ^ pszFileName, bool fRemember);

Docs.param: A zero-terminated string containing the absolute path of the file to which the object is saved.
Indicates whether pszFileName is to be used as the current working file.
Docs.summary: Saves a copy of the object into the specified file.

remarks.format: ## Remarks For more information, please see the existing documentation for `IPersistFile::Save` in the MSDN library.

MemberSignature.Value: public void SaveCompleted (string pszFileName);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void SaveCompleted(string pszFileName) cil managed
Public Sub SaveCompleted (pszFileName As String)
public: void SaveCompleted(System::String ^ pszFileName);

Docs.param: The absolute path of the file where the object was previously saved.
Docs.summary: Notifies the object that it can write to its file.

remarks.format: ## Remarks For more information, please see the existing documentation for `IPersistFile::SaveCompleted` in the MSDN library.
